name: Dog API by kinduff
description: API for dog breeds, groups, and fun facts

about.overview: The Dog API provides information on over 340 dog breeds, 20 breed groups, and fun facts, designed for easy integration into websites and applications.
features: Access to data on 340+ dog breeds
Fun dog facts for educational and entertainment purposes
useCases: Creating educational tools for pet enthusiasts
Powering bot services with random dog facts

endpoints.description: Retrieves a list of dog breeds with detailed information

quickStart: Explore the API endpoints for breeds and facts
Make a GET request to retrieve data

authentication.description: No authentication required for API access
